pullrequest.title: Communication with web server from within Gazebo

content.raw:
I'm getting this when running `gzserver.bash`:

~~~
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 6.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012-2015 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] REST web Session : 347de7a4-a96c-4c1e-97d3-d45a7c14a988
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.51
[Err] [Node.cc:98] No namespace found
[Err] [Server.cc:287] Could not open file[../../worlds/rest_web.world]
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'boost::exception_detail::clone_impl<boost::exception_detail::error_info_injector<boost::lock_error> >'
  what():  boost: mutex lock failed in pthread_mutex_lock: Invalid argument
./test/plugins/rest-web/gzserver.bash: line 3: 21375 Aborted                 (core dumped) gzserver --verbose -s libRestWebPlugin.so ../../worlds/rest_web.world
~~~
content.html:
I'm getting this when running gzserver.bash:

Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 6.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012-2015 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] REST web Session : 347de7a4-a96c-4c1e-97d3-d45a7c14a988
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.51
[Err] [Node.cc:98] No namespace found
[Err] [Server.cc:287] Could not open file[../../worlds/rest_web.world]
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'boost::exception_detail::clone_impl<boost::exception_detail::error_info_injector<boost::lock_error> >'
  what():  boost: mutex lock failed in pthread_mutex_lock: Invalid argument
./test/plugins/rest-web/gzserver.bash: line 3: 21375 Aborted                 (core dumped) gzserver --verbose -s libRestWebPlugin.so ../../worlds/rest_web.world
